mapper.select: SELECT UserID, Email, CreateDate, UpdateDate, Displayname, Username, Image, Gender, IsSmoking, Pathological, Stage, FollowCount, CancerType, metastasis, Age, Password FROM user WHERE user.Username = #{username}

SELECT UserID, password, Email, CreateDate, UpdateDate, Displayname, Username, Image, Gender, IsSmoking, Pathological, Stage, FollowCount, CancerType, metastasis, Age FROM user WHERE user.Email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (Username,Displayname,Password,Email, CreateDate, UpdateDate, FollowCount, CancerType, Pathological, Stage, IsSmoking, metastasis, Gender, Age, Image, userType) VALUES (#{username},#{displayname},#{password},#{email},#{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{followCount}, #{cancerType}, #{pathological}, #{stage}, #{isSmoking}, #{metastasis}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{image}, #{userType})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET EMAIL = #{email}, DISPLAYNAME = #{displayname}, UpdateDate = #{updateDate}, Image = #{image}, Gender = #{gender}, IsSmoking = #{isSmoking}, Pathological = #{pathological}, Stage = #{stage}, CancerType = #{cancerType}, metastasis = #{metastasis}, Age = #{age} WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO userTag(Username, TagID, DateInserted) VALUES
(#{userTag.username}, #{userTag.tagID}, #{userTag.dateInserted})
mapper.select: SELECT tag.TagID, tag.Name, tag.Description, tag.typeName FROM tag, userTag WHERE tag.TagID = userTag.TagID AND userTag.username = #{username}

SELECT UserID, Email, CreateDate, UpdateDate, Displayname, Username, Image, Gender, IsSmoking, Pathological, Stage, Age, FollowCount, CancerType FROM SuggestUserByTags WHERE (TagID = #{tagID}) AND (RankID BETWEEN #{beginIndex} AND #{endIndex})

SELECT UserID, Email, CreateDate, UpdateDate, Displayname, Username, Image, Gender, IsSmoking, Pathological, Stage, FollowCount, CancerType, metastasis, Age, Password FROM user WHERE
Username LIKE "%#{keyword}%" OR Pathological LIKE "%#{keyword}%" OR CancerType LIKE "%#{keyword}%" OR metastasis LIKE "%#{keyword}%"

SELECT UserID, Email, CreateDate, UpdateDate, Displayname, Username, Image, Gender, IsSmoking, Pathological, Stage, Age, FollowCount, CancerType FROM SuggestUserByProfile WHERE (SuggestedUsername = #{username}) AND (RankID BETWEEN #{beginIndex} AND #{endIndex})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SuggestUserByProfile where SuggestedUsername = #{suggestedUsername} AND username = #{username}
